Articles.Content:
Has Squad fixed the heating bar ram leak that was added in 1.2? I haven't seen any patch notes or update notifications

Edited May 15, 2015 by locustgate

No. They haven't released a patch since 1.0.2, so they couldn't have. There is a hotfix in the works according to a Maxmaps tweet, what it fixes, we just don't know yet. However, I would say it is a safe bet this one is getting some attention.
Just turn off PPFX edge highlighting for now, but no it's not fixed in 1.0.2
